00027 // Note To Mods //
00028 /*
00029 Please do not change anything here and release it..
00030 There is going to be a new forum created just for the Kademlia side of the client..
00031 If you feel there is an error or a way to improve something, please
00032 post it in the forum first and let us look at it.. If it is a real improvement,
00033 it will be added to the offical client.. Changing something without knowing
00034 what all it does can cause great harm to the network if released in mass form..
00035 Any mod that changes anything within the Kademlia side will not be allowed to advertise
00036 there client on the eMule forum..
00037 */
00038 
00039 #ifndef __SEARCH_H__
00040 #define __SEARCH_H__
00041 
00042 #include "SearchManager.h"
00043 
00044 class CKnownFile;
00045 class CTag;
00046 
00048 namespace Kademlia {
00050 
00051 class CKadClientSearcher;
00052 
00053 class CSearch
00054 {
00055     friend class CSearchManager;
00056 
00057 public:
00058     uint32_t GetSearchID() const throw()        { return m_searchID; }
00059     void     SetSearchID(uint32_t id) throw()   { m_searchID = id; }
00060     uint32_t GetSearchTypes() const throw()     { return m_type; }
00061     void     SetSearchTypes(uint32_t val) throw()   { m_type = val; }
00062     void     SetTargetID(const CUInt128& val) throw() { m_target = val; }
00063     CUInt128 GetTarget() const throw()      { return m_target; }
00064 
00065     uint32_t GetAnswers() const throw()     { return m_fileIDs.size() ? m_answers / ((m_fileIDs.size() + 49) / 50) : m_answers; }
00066     uint32_t GetRequestAnswer() const throw()   { return m_totalRequestAnswers; }
00067 
00068     const wxString& GetFileName(void) const throw()         { return m_fileName; }
00069     void        SetFileName(const wxString& fileName) throw()   { m_fileName = fileName; }
00070 
00071     void     AddFileID(const CUInt128& id)      { m_fileIDs.push_back(id); }
00072     void     PreparePacketForTags(CMemFile* packet, CKnownFile* file);
00073     bool     Stopping() const throw()       { return m_stopping; }
00074 
00075     uint32_t GetNodeLoad() const throw()        { return m_totalLoadResponses == 0 ? 0 : m_totalLoad / m_totalLoadResponses; }
00076     uint32_t GetNodeLoadResponse() const throw()    { return m_totalLoadResponses; }
00077     uint32_t GetNodeLoadTotal() const throw()   { return m_totalLoad; }
00078     void     UpdateNodeLoad(uint8_t load) throw()   { m_totalLoad += load; m_totalLoadResponses++; }
00079 
00080     void     SetSearchTermData(uint32_t searchTermsDataSize, const uint8_t *searchTermsData);
00081 
00082     CKadClientSearcher *    GetNodeSpecialSearchRequester() const throw()               { return m_nodeSpecialSearchRequester; }
00083     void            SetNodeSpecialSearchRequester(CKadClientSearcher *requester) throw()    { m_nodeSpecialSearchRequester = requester; }
00084 
00085     enum {
00086         NODE,
00087         NODECOMPLETE,
00088         FILE,
00089         KEYWORD,
00090         NOTES,
00091         STOREFILE,
00092         STOREKEYWORD,
00093         STORENOTES,
00094         FINDBUDDY,
00095         FINDSOURCE,
00096         NODESPECIAL,    // nodesearch request from requester "outside" of kad to find the IP of a given NodeID
00097         NODEFWCHECKUDP  // find new unknown IPs for a UDP firewallcheck
00098     };
00099 
00100     CSearch();
00101     ~CSearch();
00102 
00103 private:
00104     void Go();
00105     void ProcessResponse(uint32 fromIP, uint16 fromPort, ContactList *results);
00106     void ProcessResult(const CUInt128 &answer, TagPtrList *info);
00107     void ProcessResultFile(const CUInt128 &answer, TagPtrList *info);
00108     void ProcessResultKeyword(const CUInt128 &answer, TagPtrList *info);
00109     void ProcessResultNotes(const CUInt128 &answer, TagPtrList *info);
00110     void JumpStart();
00111     void SendFindValue(CContact *contact, bool reaskMore = false);
00112     void PrepareToStop() throw();
00113     void StorePacket();
00114 
00115     uint8_t GetRequestContactCount() const;
00116 
00117     bool        m_stopping;
00118     time_t      m_created;
00119     uint32_t    m_type;
00120     uint32_t    m_answers;
00121     uint32_t    m_totalRequestAnswers;
00122     uint32_t    m_totalLoad;
00123     uint32_t    m_totalLoadResponses;
00124     uint32_t    m_lastResponse;
00125 
00126     uint32_t    m_searchID;
00127     CUInt128    m_target;
00128     uint32_t    m_searchTermsDataSize;
00129     uint8_t *   m_searchTermsData;
00130     WordList    m_words;  // list of words in the search string (populated in CSearchManager::PrepareFindKeywords)
00131     wxString    m_fileName;
00132     UIntList    m_fileIDs;
00133     CKadClientSearcher *m_nodeSpecialSearchRequester; // used to callback result for NODESPECIAL searches
00134 
00135     typedef std::map<CUInt128, bool>    RespondedMap;
00136 
00137     ContactMap  m_possible;
00138     ContactMap  m_tried;
00139     RespondedMap    m_responded;
00140     ContactMap  m_best;
00141     ContactList m_delete;
00142     ContactMap  m_inUse;
00143     CUInt128    m_closestDistantFound; // not used for the search itself, but for statistical data collecting
00144     CContact *  m_requestedMoreNodesContact;
00145 };
00146 
00147 } // End namespace
00148 
00149 #endif //__SEARCH_H__
